app_descript:
Matchington Mansion

Brief: Step into a world of match-3 bliss and home decoration magic with Matchington Mansion. Combine your love for puzzle-solving and interior design as you swap candy pieces, uncover hidden secrets, and reveal an engaging narrative. Decorate your sprawling mansion, explore different rooms and garden areas while you enjoy a melange of DIY decorations and furniture to personalize your estate. This game combines the fun of matching with the excitement of home makeover!
